original: karuṇā, paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti attho. Kamiti vā sukhaṃ, taṃ
analyzed: karuṇā para dukkhe sati sādhūnam hadaya khedam karoti iti attho kam iti vā sukham tam

analyzed: vutta ttā karuṇā vasena iva itthā mahanta bhāvaḥ veditabbaḥ yathā evam ca

analyzed: tam ñeyya sāgara pāragum

original: gambhīrā, ekattādibhedato nandiyāvaṭṭādivibhāgato ca vicitrā visiṭṭhā nānāvidhā nayā
analyzed: gambhīrāḥ ekattā ādi bhedataḥ ca vicitrāḥ visiṭṭhāḥ nānāvidhāḥ nayāḥ

original: etissāti nipuṇagambhīravicitranayā, nipuṇagambhīravicitranayā desanā assāti nipuṇagambhīravicitranayadesano,
analyzed: etissa ati nipuṇa gambhīra vicitra nayā nipuṇa gambhīra vicitra nayā desanā assa ati nipuṇa gambhīra vicitra naya desano

original: taṃ nipuṇa…pe… desanaṃ. Nayatīti vā nayo, pāḷigati, sā ca vuttanayena atthato nipuṇā,
analyzed: tam nipuṇape desanam nayati iti vā nayaḥ pāḷigati sā ca vutta nayena atthataḥ nipuṇā

original: atthato byañjanato ca gambhīrā, saṅkhepavitthārānulomādippavattiyā nānāvidhatāya
analyzed: atthataḥ byañjanato ca gambhīrā saṅkhepa vitthāra anuloma ādi ppavattiyā nānāvidha tāya

original: vicitrā. Tathā hi paññattianupaññattiādivasena, saṃkilesabhāgiyādilokiyāditadubhayavomissatādivasena,
analyzed: vicitrā tathā hi paññatti anupaññatti ādi vasena saṃkilesa bhāgiya ādi lokiya ādi tad ubhaya vomissa tā ādi vasena

original: kusalādikhandhādisaṅgahādisamayavimuttādiṭhapanādikusalamūlāditikapaṭṭhānādivasena
analyzed: kusala ādi khandha ādi saṅgaha ādi samaya vimutta ādi ṭhapana ādi kusala mūla ādi tika paṭṭhāna ādi vasena

original: ca anekavidhā pāḷigatīti.
analyzed: ca anekavidhā pāḷigatī iti

original: Tattha dvīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā attahitasampattito, parahitappaṭipattito
analyzed: tattha dvīhā ākārehi bhagavataḥ thomanā veditabbā atta hita sampattitaḥ para hita paṭipattitaḥ

original: ca. Tesu attahitasampatti anāvaraṇañāṇādhigamato, savāsanānaṃ sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ
analyzed: ca tesu atta hita sampatti anāvaraṇa ñāṇa adhigamato sa vāsanānam sabbesam kilesānam

original: accantappahānato ca veditabbā, parahitappaṭipatti lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa
analyzed: accanta ppahānato ca veditabbā para hita ppaṭipatti lābha sakkāra ādi nirapekkha cittassa

original: sabbadukkhaniyyānikadhammadesanato, paṭiviruddhesupi niccaṃ hitajjhāsayañāṇaparipākakālāgamanato
analyzed: sabba dukkha niyyānika dhamma desanataḥ paṭiviruddhesu pi niccam hita jjhā saya ñāṇa paripāka kāla āgamanato

original: ca veditabbā. Sā panettha payogato, āsayato ca duvidhā, parahitappaṭipatti, yathāvuttabhedā
analyzed: ca veditabbā sā pana ittha payogataḥ āsayataḥ ca duvidhā para hita paṭipatti yathā vutta bhedā

original: duvidhā ca attahitasampatti pakāsitā hoti. Kathaṃ? “Mahākāruṇika”nti iminā āsayato,
analyzed: duvidhā ca atta hita sampatti pakāsitā hoti katham mahā kāruṇikanti iminā āsayato

original: “nipuṇa…pe… desana”nti iminā payogato, “nātha”nti iminā pana ubhayathāpi bhagavato
analyzed: iminā payogataḥ iminā pana ubhayathā api

original: parahitappaṭipatti pakāsitā karuṇākiccadīpanato, “ñeyyasāgarapāragu”nti iminā sātisayaṃ
analyzed: para hita paṭipatti pakāsitā karuṇā kicca dīpanataḥ ñeyya sāgara pāragunti iminā sa atisayam

original: attahitasampatti paramukkaṃsagatañāṇakiccadīpanato.
Atha vā tīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā hetuto, phalato, upakārato ca. Tattha
analyzed: atha vā tīhākārehi bhagavataḥ thomanā veditabbā hetutaḥ phalataḥ upakārato ca tattha

original: hetu mahākaruṇā, sā pana paṭhamapadena sarūpeneva dassitā. Phalaṃ catubbidhaṃ ñāṇasampadā
analyzed: hetu mahākaruṇā sā pana paṭhama padena sarūpena iva dassitā phalam catubbidham ñāṇa sampadā

original: pahānasampadā ānubhāvasampadā rūpakāyasampadā cāti. Tāsu padhānabhūtā ñāṇapahānasampadā
analyzed: pahāna sampadā ānubhāva sampadā rūpa kāya sampadā ca ati tāsu padhāna bhūtāḥ ñāṇa pahāna sampadā

original: “ñeyyasāgarapāragu”nti iminā padena pakāsitā. Padhāne hi dassite avinābhāvato itarampi
analyzed: ñeyya sāgara pāragunti iminā padena pakāsitā padhāne hi dassite avinābhāvato itaram pi

original: dvayaṃ dassitameva hoti. Na hi buddhānaṃ ānubhāvarūpakāyasampattīhi vinā kadācipi
analyzed: dvayam dassitam eva hoti na hi buddhānam ānubhāva rūpa kāya sampattīhi vinā kadāci pi

original: dhammakāyasirī vattatīti. Upakāro anantaraṃ abāhiraṃ katvā tividhayānamukhena vimuttidhammadesanā,
analyzed: dhammakāya sirī vattati iti upakāraḥ anantaram abāhiram katvā tividha yāna mukhena vimutti dhamma desanā

original: sā “nāthaṃ, nipuṇa…pe… desana”nti padadvayena pakāsitāti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sā nātham nipuṇa pe desananti pada dvayena pakāsitā iti veditabbam

original: Tattha “mahākāruṇika”nti etena sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ dasseti. Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso
analyzed: tattha mahā kāruṇikam ti etena sammāsambodhiyā mūlam dasseti mahā karuṇā sañcodita mānasaḥ

original: hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhāro anupubbena pāramiyo
analyzed: hi bhagavā saṃsāra paṅkataḥ sattānam samuddharaṇa attham kata abhinīhāraḥ anupubbena pāramiyaḥ

original: pūretvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ. “Ñeyyasāgarapāragu”nti
analyzed: pūretvā anuttaram sammāsambodhim adhigataḥ iti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyāḥ mūlam ñeyya sāgara pāragunti

original: etena pubbabhāgappaṭipattiyā saddhiṃ sammāsambodhiṃ dasseti. Anāvaraṇañāṇapadaṭṭhānañhi
analyzed: etena pubba bhāga paṭipattiyā saddhim sammāsambodhim dasseti anāvaraṇa ñāṇa padaṭṭhānam hi

original: maggañāṇaṃ, maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ “sammāsambodhī”ti vuccati. Vuttappabhedaṃ
analyzed: magga ñāṇam magga ñāṇa padaṭṭhānam ca anāvaraṇa ñāṇam sammāsambodhi iti vuccati vutta ppabhedam

original: pana sammasanañāṇaṃ saha paññāpāramiyā tassā pubbabhāgapaṭipadā. Tassā hi ānubhāvena
analyzed: pana sammasana ñāṇam saha paññāpāramiyā tassā pubba bhāga paṭipadā tassā hi ānubhāvena

original: līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhallikattakilamathānuyogasassatucchedādiantadvayavirahitā
analyzed: līn uddhacca patiṭṭhāna ā yūhana kāma su khalli katta kilamatha anuyoga sassatu cheda ādi anta dvaya virahitā

original: ukkaṃsapāramippattā majjhimā paṭipadā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gatā. “Nātha”nti iminā sammāsambodhiyā
analyzed: ukkaṃsa pārami pattā majjhimā paṭipadā bhāvanā pāripūrim gatā iminā sammāsambodhiyā

original: phalaṃ dasseti lokattayanāyakabhāvadīpanato. Tathā hi sabbānatthaparihārapubbaṅgamāya
analyzed: phalam dasseti loka ttaya nāyaka bhāva dīpanato tathā hi sabba anattha parihāra pubbaṅgamāya

original: niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā, sadevamanussāya
analyzed: niravasesa hita sukha vidhāna tapparāya niratisayāya payoga sampattiyā sa deva manussāya

original: pajāya accantupakāritāya aparimitanirupamabhāvaguṇavisesasamaṅgitāya ca sabbasattuttamo
analyzed: pajāya accantupakāritāya aparimita nirupama bhāva guṇa visesa samaṅgi tāya ca sabba sattuttamaḥ

original: bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ anuttaragāravaṭṭhānabhūtatāya
analyzed: bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānam sattānam anuttara gāravaṭṭhāna bhūta tāya

original: ca “nātho”ti vuccatīti. “Nipuṇa…pe… desana”nti iminā sammāsambodhiyā payojanaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: ca nātho ti vuccati iti desanam ti iminā sammāsambodhiyā payojanam dasseti

original: Saṃsāramahoghato sattasantāraṇatthañhi bhagavatā sammāsambodhi abhipatthitā, tañca
analyzed: saṃsāra mahoghato satta santāraṇa attham hi bhagavatā sammāsambodhi abhipatthitā tat ca

original: sattasantāraṇaṃ yathāvuttadesanāsampattiyā samijjhati tadavinābhāvato. Iminā bhagavato
analyzed: satta santāraṇam yathā vutta desanā sampattiyā samijjhati tad avinābhāvataḥ iminā bhagavataḥ

original: sātisayā parahitappaṭipatti dassitā, itarehi attahitasampattīti tadubhayena attahitāya
analyzed: sa atisayā para hita paṭipatti dassitā itarehi atta hita sampatti iti tad ubhayena atta hitāya

original: paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu bhagavato catutthapuggalabhāvaṃ dīpeti, tena ca anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvaṃ,
analyzed: paṭipanna ādīsu catūsu puggalesu bhagavato catuttha puggala bhāvam dīpeti tena ca anuttara dakkhiṇeyya bhāvam

original: uttamavandanīyabhāvaṃ, attano ca vandanakiriyāya khettaṅgatabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
analyzed: uttama vandanīya bhāvam ca vandana kiriyāya khettaṅgata bhāvam dīpeti

original: Ettha ca yathā “mahākāruṇika”nti iminā padena bhagavato mahākaruṇā dassitā, evaṃ
analyzed: ettha ca yathā mahā kāruṇikanti iminā padena bhagavataḥ mahā karuṇā dassitā evam

original: “ñeyyasāgarapāragu”nti etena mahāpaññā dassitā. Tesu karuṇāggahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato
analyzed: ñeyya sāgara pāragunti etena mahā paññā dassitā tesu karuṇā ggahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggata bhāva ppatta asādhāraṇa guṇa dīpanato

original: bhagavato sabbalokiyaguṇasampatti dassitā hoti, paññāggahaṇena sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānamaggañāṇadīpanato
analyzed: bhagavato sabba lokiya guṇa sampatti dassitā hoti paññā ggahaṇena sabbaññuta ññāṇa padaṭṭhāna magga ñāṇa dīpanato

original: sabbalokuttaraguṇasampatti. Tadubhayaggahaṇasiddho eva cattho nāthasaddena pakāsīyati.
analyzed: eva cattho nātha saddena pakāsīyati

original: Karuṇāvacanena upagamanaṃ nirupakkilesaṃ dasseti, paññāvacanena apagamanaṃ. Tathā
analyzed: karuṇā vacanena upagamanam nirupakkilesam dasseti paññā vacanena apagamanam tathā

original: karuṇāggahaṇena lokasamaññānurūpaṃ bhagavato pavattiṃ dasseti lokavohāravisayattā
analyzed: karuṇā ggahaṇena loka samaññā anurūpam bhagavato pavattim dasseti loka vohāra visaya ttā

original: karuṇāya, paññāggahaṇena samaññāya anatidhāvanaṃ. Sabhāvānavabodhena hi dhammānaṃ
analyzed: karuṇāya paññā ggahaṇena samaññāya an atidhāvanam sabhāva an avabodhena hi dhammānam

original: samaññaṃ atidhāvitvā sattādisammasanaṃ hotīti. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena mahākaruṇāsamāpattivihāraṃ
analyzed: samaññam atidhāvitvā satta ādi sammasanam hoti iti tathā karuṇā ggahaṇena mahākaruṇā samāpatti vihāram

original: dasseti, paññāggahaṇena tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ, catusaccañāṇaṃ, catupaṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ,
analyzed: dasseti paññā ggahaṇena tīsu kālesu appaṭihata ñāṇam catu sacca ñāṇam catu paṭisambhidā ñāṇam

original: catuvesārajjañāṇaṃ. Karuṇāggahaṇena mahākaruṇāsamāpattiñāṇassa gahitattā sesāsādhāraṇañāṇāni,
analyzed: catu vesārajja ñāṇam karuṇā ggahaṇena mahākaruṇā samāpatti ñāṇassa gahita ttā sesa a sādhāraṇa ñāṇāni

original: cha abhiññā, aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇāni, dasa balāni, cuddasa buddhañāṇāni,
analyzed: cha abhiññāḥ aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampana ñāṇāni dasa balāni cuddasa buddha ñāṇāni

original: soḷasa ñāṇacariyā, aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā, catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni sattasattati
analyzed: soḷasa ñāṇa cariyāḥ aṭṭhārasa buddha dhammā catucattālīsa ñāṇa vatthūni satta sattati

original: ñāṇavatthūnīti evamādīnaṃ anekesaṃ paññāppabhedānaṃ vasena ñāṇacāraṃ dasseti.
analyzed: ñāṇa vatthūni iti evamādīnam anekesam paññā appabhedānam vasena ñāṇa cāram dasseti

original: Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena caraṇasampatti, paññāggahaṇena vijjāsampatti. Karuṇāggahaṇena
analyzed: tathā karuṇā ggahaṇena caraṇa sampatti paññā ggahaṇena vijjā sampatti karuṇā ggahaṇena

original: sattādhipatitā, paññāggahaṇena dhammādhipatitā. Karuṇāggahaṇena lokanāthabhāvo, paññāggahaṇena
analyzed: satta adhipati tā paññā ggahaṇena dhamma adhipati tā karuṇā ggahaṇena loka nātha bhāvo paññā ggahaṇena

original: attanāthabhāvo. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena pubbakāribhāvo, paññāggahaṇena kataññutā. Karuṇāggahaṇena
analyzed: atta nātha bhāvo tathā karuṇā ggahaṇena pubba kāri bhāvo paññā ggahaṇena kataññu tā karuṇā ggahaṇena

original: aparantapatā, paññāggahaṇena anattantapatā. Karuṇāggahaṇena vā buddhakaradhammasiddhi,
analyzed: aparantapa tā paññā ggahaṇena anattantapa tā karuṇā ggahaṇena vā buddha kara dhamma siddhi

original: paññāggahaṇena buddhabhāvasiddhi. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena paresaṃ tāraṇaṃ, paññāggahaṇena
analyzed: paññā ggahaṇena buddha bhāva siddhi tathā karuṇā ggahaṇena paresam tāraṇam paññā ggahaṇena

original: sayaṃ tāraṇaṃ. Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena sabbasattesu anuggahacittatā, paññāggahaṇena
analyzed: sayam tāraṇam tathā karuṇā ggahaṇena sabba sattesu anuggaha citta tā paññā ggahaṇena

original: sabbadhammesu virattacittatā dassitā hoti. Sabbesañca buddhaguṇānaṃ karuṇā ādi taṃnidānabhāvato,
analyzed: sabba dhammesu viratta citta tā dassitā hoti sabbesam ca buddha guṇānam karuṇā ādi tad nidāna bhāvato

original: paññā pariyosānaṃ tato uttari karaṇīyābhāvato, iti ādipariyosānadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā
analyzed: paññā pariyosānam tatas uttari karaṇīya abhāvato iti ādi pariyosāna dassanena sabbe buddha guṇā

original: dassitā honti. Tathā karuṇāvacanena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito
analyzed: dassitāḥ honti tathā karuṇā vacanena sīla kkhandha pubbaṅgamaḥ samādhi kkhandho dassito

original: hoti. Karuṇānidānañhi sīlaṃ tato pāṇātipātādiviratippavattito, sā ca jhānattayasampayoginīti.
analyzed: hoti karuṇā nidānam hi sīlam tatas pāṇa atipāta ādi virati pavattito sā ca jhāna ttaya sampayoginī iti

original: Paññāvacanena paññākkhandho. Sīlañca sabbabuddhaguṇānaṃ ādi, samādhi majjhe, paññā
analyzed: paññā vacanena paññā kkhandho sīlañca sabba buddha guṇānaṃ ādi samādhi majjhe paññā

original: pariyosānanti evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti nayato
analyzed: pariyosānanti evam pi ādi majjha pariyosāna kalyāṇā sabbe buddha guṇāḥ dassitāḥ honti nayataḥ

original: dassitattā. Eso eva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṃ dassanupāyo, yadidaṃ nayaggāhaṇaṃ,
analyzed: dassita ttā esaḥ eva hi niravasesataḥ buddha guṇānam dassan upāyaḥ yat idam naya ggāhaṇam

original: aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṃ niravasesato dassetuṃ. Tenevāha –
analyzed: aññathā kaḥ nāma samatthaḥ bhagavataḥ guṇe anupadam niravasesataḥ dassetum tena iva āha

original: “Buddhopi buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇaṃ, kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno;
analyzed: buddhaḥ api buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇam kappam pi ce aññam a bhāsamāno

original: Khīyetha kappo ciradīghamantare, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā”ti. ;
analyzed: khīyetha kappo cira dīgham antare vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassa ati

original: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenāpi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṃ pati anuyuttena “no hetaṃ, bhante”ti paṭikkhipitvā “apica me, bhante, dhammanvayo vidito”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tena iva ca āyasmatā sāriputta therena api buddha guṇa paricchedanam anuyuttena no ha etam bhante iti paṭikkhipitvā apica me bhante dhamma anvayaḥ viditaḥ iti vuttam

original: Evaṃ saṅkhepena sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni saddhammaṃ thometuṃ
analyzed: evam saṅkhepena sakala sabbaññu guṇehi bhagavantam abhitthavitvā idāni saddhammam thometum

original: “vijjācaraṇasampannā”tiādimāha. Tattha vijjācaraṇasampannā hutvāti vacanaseso. Vindiyaṃ
analyzed: vijjā ācaraṇa sampannā iti ādim āha tattha vijjā ācaraṇa sampannā hutvā iti vacana sesaḥ

original: dhammānaṃ salakkhaṇaṃ, sāmaññalakkhaṇañca vindatīti vijjā, lobhakkhandhādīni vā vijjhanaṭṭhena
analyzed: dhammānam sa lakkhaṇam sāmañña lakkhaṇañca vindati iti vijjā lobha kkhandha ādīni vā

original: vijjā, catunnaṃ vā ariyasaccānaṃ viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vijjāti evaṃ tāvettha vacanatthato
analyzed: vijjā catunnam vā ariya saccānam vidita karaṇa ṭṭhena vijjā ti evam tāva ettha vacana atthato

original: vijjā veditabbā. Pabhedato pana tissopi vijjā vijjā bhayabheravasutte āgataniyāmeneva,
analyzed: vijjā veditabbā pabhedato pana tissaḥ api vijjā vijjā bhayabheravasutte āgata niyāmena iva

original: aṭṭhapi vijjā vijjā ambaṭṭhasuttādīsu āgataniyāmeneva. Caranti tehīti caraṇāni, sīlasaṃvarādayo
analyzed: aṭṭha api vijjāḥ vijjāḥ ambaṭṭha sutta ādīsu āgata niyāmena iva caranti tehi iti caraṇāni sīla saṃvara ādayaḥ

original: pañcadasa dhammā, iti imāhi vijjāhi, imehi ca caraṇehi sampannā sampannāgatāti vijjācaraṇasampannā.
analyzed: pañcadasa dhammāḥ iti imāhi vijjāhi imehi ca caraṇehi sampannā sampanna āgatā ati vijjā caraṇa sampannā

original: Yenāti yena dhammena karaṇabhūtena, hetubhūtena ca. Tattha maggadhammassa karaṇattho

original: attho. Yadā yo kālaviseso “sve”ti laddhavohāro, tadā so taṃdivasātikkame “ajjā”ti,
analyzed: atthaḥ yadā yaḥ kāla viseso svā iti laddha vohāro tadā saḥ tad divasa atikkame ajjā ti

original: puna taṃdivasātikkame “hiyyo”ti voharīyatīti anavaṭṭhitasabhāvā ete kālavisesā. Disāyapi
analyzed: puna tad divasa atikkame hiyyoti voharīyati iti anavaṭṭhita sabhāvāḥ ete kāla visesāḥ

original: “ekaṃ avadhiṃ apekkhitvā puratthimā disā, tato aññaṃ apekkhitvā pacchimā nāma hotī”tiādinā
analyzed: ekam avadhim apekkhitvā puratthimā disā tatas aññam apekkhitvā pacchimā nāma hoti itiādinā

original: anavaṭṭhitasabhāvatā veditabbā. Jātiādiapekkhāyāti jātiādidukkhavisesāpekkhāya. Saccāpekkhāyāti
analyzed: anavaṭṭhita sabhāva tā veditabbā jāti ādi apekkhāya ati jāti ādi dukkha visesa apekkhāya sacca apekkhāya ati

original: saccasāmaññāpekkhāya. “Taṇhā”ti vuccamānaṃ kāmataṇhādiapekkhāya sāmaññampi samānaṃ
analyzed: sacca sāmañña apekkhāya taṇhā ti vuccamānam kāma taṇhā ādi apekkhāya sāmaññam pi samānam

original: saccāpekkhāya viseso hotīti evamādiṃ sandhāyāha “esa nayo samudayādīsupī”ti.
analyzed: sacca apekkhāya visesaḥ hoti iti evamādim sandhāya āha esa nayaḥ samudaya ādīsu pi iti

original: 16. Etthāti etasmiṃ buddhavacane. Tenāha “sikkhattayasaṅkhātassā”tiādi. Yathārutaṃ
analyzed: ettha iti etasmim buddha vacane tena āha sikkhattaya saṅkhātassa atiādi yathārutam

original: yathākathitaṃ saddato adhigataṃ niddhāritaṃ, na atthappakaraṇaliṅgasaddantarasannidhānādippamāṇantarādhigataṃ.
analyzed: yathā kathitam saddataḥ adhigatam niddhāritam na attha pakaraṇa liṅga sadda ntara sannidhāna ādi ppamāṇa antara adhigatam

original: “Atthato dassitā”ti idaṃ yasmiṃ sutte bhāvanāva kathitā, na pahānaṃ, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: atthataḥ dassitā ti idam yasmin sutte bhāvanā eva kathitā na pahānam tam sandhāya vuttam

original: Nayasaṅkhepavaṇṇanā
analyzed: naya saṅkhepa vaṇṇanā

original: 17. Taṇhāvijjāhi karaṇabhūtāhi. Saṃkileso pakkho etassāti saṃkilesapakkho, saṃkilesapakkhiko
analyzed: taṇhā vijjāhi karaṇa bhūtāhi saṃkilesaḥ pakkhaḥ etassa ati saṃkilesa pakkhaḥ saṃkilesa pakkhiko

original: suttattho, tassa nayanalakkhaṇoti yojanā. Vodānapakkhassa suttatthassāti sambandho.
analyzed: sutta atthaḥ tassa nayana lakkhaṇaḥ ti yojanā vodāna pakkhassa sutta atthassa ati sambandho

original: Vuṭṭhānagāminiyā, balavavipassanāya ca dukkhādīsu pariññeyyatādīni maggānuguṇo gahaṇākāro
analyzed: vuṭṭhāna gāminiyā balava vipassanāya ca dukkha ādīsu pariññeyya tā ādīni magga anuguṇaḥ gahaṇa ākāraḥ

original: anugāhaṇanayo. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ nayoti āha “tassa panā”tiādi. Tattha “nayavohāro”ti
analyzed: anugāhaṇa nayaḥ yadi evam katham nayaḥ iti āha tassa pana atiādi tattha naya vohāro ti

original: iminā nayādhiṭṭhānaṃ nayoti vuttanti dasseti.
analyzed: iminā naya adhiṭṭhānam nayo ti vuttanti dasseti

original: 18. Bādhakādibhāvatoti bādhakapabhavasantiniyyānabhāvato. Aññathābhāvābhāvenāti abādhakaappabhavaasanti
analyzed: bādhaka ādi bhāvataḥ ti bādhaka pabhava santi niyyāna bhāvataḥ aññathā bhāva abhāvena ati abādhaka appabhava asanti

original: aniyyānabhāvābhāvena. Saccasabhāvattāti amusāsabhāvattā. Avisaṃvādanatoti ariyasabhāvādibhāvassa
analyzed: a niyyāna bhāva abhāvena sacca sabhāva ttā ati a musā sabhāva ttā a visaṃvādanato ti ariya sabhāva ādi bhāvassa

original: na visaṃvādanato ekantikattāti attho.
analyzed: na visaṃvādanataḥ ekantika ttā ti attho

original: 19. Saṃkiliṭṭhadhammāti saṃkilesasamannāgatā dhammā saddhammanayakovidāti saccapaṭiccasamuppādādidhammanayakusalā, ekattādinayakusalā vā.
analyzed: saṃkiliṭṭha dhammā ati saṃkilesa samannāgatāḥ dhammāḥ saddhamma naya kovidāḥ ti sacca paṭiccasamuppāda ādi dhamma naya kusalāḥ ekatta ādi naya kusalāḥ vā

original: 20. Atthavissajjanesūti “ime dhammā kusalā”tiādinā sutte katapañhavissajjanesu ceva
analyzed: attha vissajjanesu iti ime dhammā kusala ati ādinā sutte kata pañha vissajjanesu ca iva

original: aṭṭhakathāya kataatthasaṃvaṇṇanāsu ca. “Vodāniyā”ti iminā anavajjadhammā idha kusalāti
analyzed: aṭṭhakathāya kata attha saṃvaṇṇanāsu ca iminā anavajja dhammā idha

original: adhippetā, na sukhavipākāti dasseti. Tassa tassa atthanayassa yojanatthaṃ manasā
analyzed: adhippetā na sukha vipākā ati dasseti tassa tassa attha nayassa yojana attham manasā

original: volokayateti yojanā.
analyzed: volokayata iti yojanā

original: 21. Yadi karaṇabhūtaṃ, kathaṃ tassa atthantarābhāvoti āha “yena hī”tiādi. Disābhūtadhammānaṃ
analyzed: yadi karaṇa bhūtam katham tassa atthantara abhāvaḥ ti āha yena hi itiādi disā bhūta dhammānam

original: volokayanasamānayanabhāvato vohārabhūto, kammabhūto ca nayo, na nandiyāvaṭṭādayo
analyzed: volokayana samānayana bhāvataḥ vohāra bhūto kamma bhūto ca nayaḥ na nandiyāvaṭṭa ādayo

original: viya atthabhūtoti “vohāranayo, kammanayo”ti ca vuccati.
analyzed: viya attha bhūto ti vohāra nayo kamma nayo ti ca vuccati

original: Dvādasapadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: dvādasa pada vaṇṇanā

original: 23. Apariyosite padeti uccāraṇavelāyaṃ pade asamatte, vippakateti attho. Pariyosite
analyzed: a pariyosite pade iti uccāraṇa velāyam pade a samatte vippakatā iti attho pariyosite

original: hi “pada”ntve samaññā siyā, na “akkhara”nti adhippāyo. Padassa vevacanatāya atthavasena
analyzed: hi pada ntve samaññā siyā na akkharanti adhippāyaḥ padassa vevacana tāya attha vasena

original: pariyāyaṃ kharantaṃ sañcarantaṃ viya hoti, na evaṃ vaṇṇo avevacanattāti āha pariyāyavasena
analyzed: pariyāyam kharantam sañcarantam viya hoti na evam vaṇṇaḥ āha pariyāya vasena

original: akkharaṇato”ti. Na hi vaṇṇassa pariyāyo vijjatī”ti idaṃ akārādivaṇṇavisesaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: akkharaṇato ti na hi vaṇṇassa pariyāyaḥ vijjati iti idam akāra ādi vaṇṇa visesam sandhāya

original: vadati, na vaṇṇasāmaññaṃ. Tassa hi vaṇṇo akkharanti pariyāyo vutto evāti.
analyzed: vadati na vaṇṇa sāmaññam tassa hi vaṇṇaḥ akkharanti pariyāyaḥ vuttaḥ eva ati

original: Akkharasaddassa atthaṃ vatvā tappasaṅgena vaṇṇasaddassapi vattuṃ “kenaṭṭhena vaṇṇo”tiādimāha.
analyzed: akkhara saddassa attham vatvā tad pasaṅgena vaṇṇa saddassa api vattum kenaṭṭhena vaṇṇa uti ādim āha

original: Tattha nanu padena, vākyena vā attho saṃvaṇṇīyati, na akkharenāti codanaṃ manasi
analyzed: tattha nanu padena vākyena vā attho saṃvaṇṇīyati na akkharena ati codanam manasi

original: katvā āha “vaṇṇo eva hī”tiādi. Padādibhāvenāti padavākyabhāvena. Yathāsambandhanti
analyzed: katvā āha vaṇṇaḥ eva hi itiādi pada ādi bhāvena ati pada vākya bhāvena

original: yathāsaṅketaṃ. Ayaṃ-saddo imassatthassa vācako, ayaṃ attho imassa saddassa vacanīyoti
analyzed: yathāsaṅketam ayam saddo imassa atthassa vācakaḥ ayam atthaḥ imassa saddassa vacanīyaḥ ti

original: yathāgahitasaṅketānurūpaṃ saddatthānaṃ vācakavacanīyabhāvo. Atha vā yvāyaṃ saddatthānaṃ
analyzed: yathā gahita saṅketa anurūpam sat datthānam vācaka vacanīya bhāvaḥ atha vā yvā ayam sat datthānam

original: aññamaññaṃ avinābhāvo, so sambandho. Tadanurūpaṃ ekakkharaṃ nāmapadaṃ “mā evaṃ maññasī”tiādīsu
analyzed: avinābhāvaḥ saḥ sambandho tad anurūpam ekakkharam nāmapadam mā evam maññasi itiādīsu

original: mā-kārādi. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino. Te hi abhidhammadesanaṃ “manasādesanā”ti vadanti,
analyzed: mākāra ādi keci iti abhayagiri vāsino te hi abhidhamma desanam vadanti

original: yato rāhulācariyo “visuddhakaruṇānaṃ manasādesanā vācāya akkharaṇato akkharasaññitā”ti āha.
analyzed: yatas rāhula ācariyaḥ manasā desanā vācāya akkharaṇataḥ akkhara saññitā ti āha

original: Satvappadhānanti drabyappadhānaṃ. Nāmapade hi drabyamāvibhūtarūpaṃ, kiriyā anāvibhūtarūpā
analyzed: sattva ppadhānanti drabya ppadhānam nāma pade hi drabyam āvibhūta rūpam kiriyā an āvibhūta rūpā

original: yathā “phasso”ti. Ākhyātapade pana kiriyā āvibhūtarūpā, drabyamanāvibhūtarūpaṃ yathā
analyzed: yathā ākhyāta pade pana kiriyā āvibhūta rūpā drabyam anāvibhūta rūpam yathā

original: “phusatī”ti. Tena nesaṃ satvakiriyāppadhānatā vuttā. Kiriyāvisesaggahaṇanimittanti
analyzed: phusati iti tena na īsam satva kiriyā ppadhāna tā vuttā kiriyā visesa ggahaṇa nimittam

original: kiriyāvisesāvabodhahetu kiriyāvisesadīpanato, yathā “cirappavāsi”nti ettha pa-saddo
analyzed: kiriyā visesa avabodha hetu kiriyā visesa dīpanataḥ yathā cirappavāsin ti ettha pasaddaḥ

original: vasanakiriyāya viyogavisiṭṭhataṃ dīpeti. “Evaṃ manasi karotha, mā evaṃ manasākatthā”tiādīsu
analyzed: vasana kiriyāya dīpeti evam manasi karotha mā evam manasā akattha atiādīsu

original: kiriyāvisesassa jotako evaṃ-saddo. “Evaṃsīlā evaṃdhammā”tiādīsu satvavisesassa. Evaṃ
analyzed: kiriyā visesassa jotakaḥ evaṃsaddaḥ evaṃsīlāḥ evaṃdhammāḥ ti ādīsu sattva visesassa evam

original: sesanipātapadānampīti adhippāyo. Tenāha “kiriyāya…pe… nipātapada”nti.
analyzed: sesa nipāta padānam pi iti adhippāyaḥ tena āha

original: Saṅkhepato vuttaṃ, kiṃ pana tanti āha “padābhihita”nti. Atha vā saṅkhepato vuttaṃ,
analyzed: saṅkhepataḥ vuttam kim pana tat ti āha pada abhihitan ti atha vā saṅkhepataḥ vuttam

original: yo akkharehi saṅkāsitoti vuccati. Padābhihitaṃ padehi kathitaṃ, yo padehi pakāsitoti
analyzed: yaḥ akkharehi saṅkāsito ti vuccati pada abhihitam padehi kathitam yaḥ padehi pakāsito ti

original: vuccati. Tadubhayaṃ, yadi padasamudāyo vākyaṃ, tassa ko paricchedo. Yāvatā adhippetatthapariyosānaṃ,
analyzed: vuccati tat ubhayam yadi pada samudāyaḥ vākyam tassa kaḥ paricchedaḥ yāvatā adhippeta attha pariyosānam

original: tāvatā ekavākyantipi vadanti, bahūpettha pakāre vaṇṇenti. Kiṃ tehi, sākhyātaṃ sābyayaṃ
analyzed: vadanti vadanti kim tehi sa ākhyātam sa abyayam

original: sakārakaṃ savisesanaṃ “vākya”nti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nanu ca padenapi attho byañjīyatīti
analyzed: sakārakam sa visesanam vākyanti daṭṭhabbam nanu ca padena api atthaḥ byañjīyati iti

original: codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “padamattasavanepi hī”tiādi. Ākāresu vākyavibhāgesu abhihitaṃ
analyzed: codanam manasi katvā āha pada matta savane pi hi itiādi ākāresu vākya vibhāgesu abhihitam

original: kathitaṃ nibbacanaṃ ākārābhihitaṃ nibbacanaṃ. “Abhihitanti ca pāḷiāgata”nti vadanti.
analyzed: kathitam nibbacanam ākāra abhihitam nibbacanam abhihitanti ca pāḷi āgatanti vadanti

original: “Nibbānaṃ maggati, nibbānatthikehi vā maggīyati, kilese vā mārento gacchatīti maggo”tiādinā
analyzed: nibbānam maggati nibbāna atthikehi vā maggīyati kilese vā mārentaḥ gacchati iti magga uti ādinā

original: nibbacanānaṃ vitthāro. Taṃniddesakathanattā niddesoti imamatthamāha “nibbacanavitthāro
analyzed: nibbacanānam vitthāraḥ tad niddesa kathana ttā niddesaḥ ti imam attham āha nibbacana vitthāro

original: niravasesadesanattā niddeso”ti. Padehīti vākyāvayavabhūtehi, vākyato vibhajjamānehi
analyzed: niravasesa desana ttā padehi iti vākya avayava bhūtehi vākyataḥ vibhajjamānehi

original: vā ākhyātādipadehi. Tenāha “vākyassa vibhāgo”ti, tathā cāha “apariyosite”tiādi. Apare
analyzed: vā ākhyāta ādi padehi tena āha vākyassa vibhāgaḥ iti tathā ca āha apariyosita itiādi apare

original: pana “pakatipaccayalopādesādivasena akkharavibhāgo ākāro, niruttinayena padavibhāgo
analyzed: pana pakati paccaya lopa ādesa ādi vasena akkhara vibhāgaḥ ākāraḥ nirutti nayena pada vibhāgaḥ

original: nibbacanaṃ, vākyavibhāgo niddeso. Vaṇṇapadavākyāni hi avibhattāni, vibhattāni ca
analyzed: nibbacanam vākya vibhāgaḥ niddesaḥ vaṇṇa pada vākyāni hi avibhattāni vibhattāni ca

original: cha byañjanapadānī”ti vadanti. Chaṭṭhaṃ vacananti chaṭṭhaṃ padaṃ. Kātabbanti “akkharaṃ
analyzed: cha byañjana padāni iti vadanti chaṭṭham vacananti chaṭṭham padam kātabbanti akkharam

original: padaṃ byañjanaṃ ākāro tatheva nirutti niddeso chaṭṭhavacana”nti gāthāyaṃ evaṃ kattabbaṃ,
analyzed: padam byañjanam ākāro tathā iva nirutti niddeso chaṭṭhavacanan ti gāthāyam evam kattabbam

original: saṃvaṇṇanāvasena vā ākārapadaṃ catutthaṃ kātabbanti attho. Sabbo saddavohāro vibhattehi,
analyzed: saṃvaṇṇanā vasena vā ākāra padam catuttham kātabbanti attho sabbaḥ sadda vohāraḥ vibhattehi

original: avibhattehi ca akkharapadavākyeheva, tadaññappakāro natthīti āha “yānimānī”tiādi.
analyzed: avibhattehi ca akkhara pada vākyehi iva tad añña ppakāraḥ natthi iti āha yāni imāni itiādi

original: 24. Kāsanāsaddo kammatthoti dassetuṃ “kāsīyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Padehi tāva atthassa
analyzed: kāsanā saddaḥ kammatthaḥ ti dassetum kāsīyati itiādi vuttam padehi tāva atthassa

original: saṅkāsanā, pakāsanā ca hotu, padāvadhikāpi saṃvaṇṇanā icchitāti akkharehi pana kathanti
analyzed: saṅkāsanā pakāsanā ca hotu pada avadhikā api saṃvaṇṇanā icchitā ati akkharehi pana kathanti

original: āha “akkharehi suyyamānehī”tiādi. Padatthasampaṭipattīti padābhidheyyaatthāvabodho.
analyzed: āha akkharehi suyyamānehi itiādi padattha sampaṭipatti iti

original: “Akkharehi saṅkāsetī”tiādinā akkharakaraṇaṃ saṅkāsanabhūtaṃ ugghaṭanakiriyaṃ vadantena
analyzed: akkharehi saṅkāseti iti ādinā akkhara karaṇam saṅkāsana bhūtam ugghaṭana kiriyam vadantena

original: yathāvutto attho sādhitoti dassetuṃ “tathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: yathā vuttaḥ atthaḥ sādhito ti dassetum tathā hi itiādi vuttam

original: Vibhajanuttānīkammapaññattīti ekattaniddeso samāhāroti ayaṃ dvandasamāso. Ubhayenāti
analyzed: vibhaja nuttānī kamma paññattī iti ekatta niddeso samāhāraḥ ti ayam dvanda samāsaḥ ubhayena ati

original: “vivaraṇā, vibhajanā”ti iminā dvayena. Etehīti ettha eva-kāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti āha
analyzed: vivaraṇāḥ vibhajanā ti iminā dvayena etehi iti ettha eva kāraḥ āha

original: “etehi evā”ti. “Saṅkāsanā…pe… abhāvato”ti iminā yathādhippetaanūnāvadhāraṇaphalaṃ
analyzed: etehi eva ati abhāvataḥ ti iminā

original: dasseti. Ugghaṭanādīti ādisaddena vipañcananayāni saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: dassa iti ugghaṭana ādi iti ādi saddena saṅgaṇhāti

original: 25. Sammā yuttoti sammā aviparītaṃ, anavasesato ca yutto sahito. Tathā hi vuttaṃ
analyzed: sammā yuttaḥ ti sammā aviparītam anavasesataḥ ca yuttaḥ sahitaḥ tathā hi vuttam

original: “anūnā”ti. Sabbo hi pāḷiattho atthapadaatthanayehi anavasesato saṅgahito. Tenāha “sabbassa hī”tiādi.
analyzed: anūnā iti sabbaḥ hi pāḷi atthaḥ attha pada attha nayehi anavasesataḥ saṅgahitaḥ tena āha sabbassa hi itiādi

original: 26. Kasmā panettha mūlapadapadaṭṭhānāni asaṅgahitānīti? Padatthantarābhāvato. Mūlapadāni
analyzed: kasmā pana ittha mūlapada padaṭṭhānāni asaṅgahitāni iti padattha antara abhāvataḥ mūlapadāni

original: hi nayānaṃ samuṭṭhānamattattā padaṭṭhānānīti dassitoyaṃ nayo. Tena vuttaṃ “ito vinimutto
analyzed: hi nayānam samuṭṭhāna matta ttā padaṭṭhānāni iti dassitaḥ ayam nayo tena vuttam itas vinimutto

original: koci nettipadattho natthī”ti.
analyzed: koci na itti padattho natthi iti

original: Nettiyā kāraṇabhūtāya. Hārā saṃvaṇṇetabbāti suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena hārā vitthāretabbā.
analyzed: nettiyā kāraṇa bhūtāya hārā saṃvaṇṇetabbā ati suttassa attha saṃvaṇṇanā vasena hārā vitthāretabbā

original: Svāyanti so ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanākkamo. Yena anukkamena nettiyaṃ desitā, teneva sutte atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena
analyzed: su āyanti saḥ ayam saṃvaṇṇanā kkamaḥ yena anukkamena nettiyam desitā tena iva sutte attha saṃvaṇṇanā vasena

original: yojetabbāti. Evaṃ siddheti desanākkameneva siddhe. Ayaṃ ārambhoti “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”nti
analyzed: yojetabbā ati evam siddhā iti desanā kkamena iva siddhe ayam soḷasa hārā paṭhamanti

original: evaṃ pavatto ārambho. Imamatthanti imaṃ vuccamānaniyamasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ.
analyzed: evam pavattaḥ ārambhaḥ imam attham ti imam vuccamāna niyama saṅkhātam attham

original: Yadi desitakkameneva hāranayā sutte yojetabbā siyuṃ, kiṃ so kamo kāraṇanirapekkho,
analyzed: yadi desita kkamena iva hāra nayā sutte yojetabbā siyum kim so kamaḥ kāraṇa nirapekkho

original: Liṅgato – “sītenapi ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppatī”tiādi. Sītādiggahaṇena hi liṅgena bhūtupādāyappakārasseva dhammassa rūpabhāvo, na itarassa.

original: anavasesasattavācakatte ādittatā sāpekkhasseva atthassa vācakattā padesavācī sabbasaddo,

original: Sabhāvalakkhaṇatoti asucibhāvena lakkhitabbato.

analyzed: yāthāvasa rasa lakkhaṇanti rasitabbaḥ oti raso paṭivijjhitabbaḥ sabhāvaḥ attano raso

analyzed: sarasaḥ yāthāvaḥ sarasaḥ yāthāva sarasaḥ yāthāva sarasaḥ eva lakkhitabbattā lakkhaṇanti

original: yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ. Atha vā yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇanti aviparītaṃ attano pavattisaṅkhātaṃ

analyzed: ñātum na sakkoti tad visaya ñāṇa uppattim nivārentī chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhati iti

original: vuttā. Tena vuttaṃ “jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na detī”ti. Tayidamassā kiccanti kiccato
analyzed: vuttā tena vuttam jānitum paṭivijjhitum na deti iti tayidam assā kiccanti kiccataḥ

original: kathitā. Kathitāti ca vuttā, yato ca avijjā asampaṭivedharasāti vuccati. Jāyati etthāti
analyzed: kathitā kathitā iti ca vuttā yato ca avijjā a sampaṭivedha rasā ati vuccati jāyati ettha ati

analyzed: jāti uppatti ṭṭhānam yadi pi nirodha magge avijjā ārammaṇam na karoti te pana jānitu kāmassa

original: tappaṭicchādanavasena anirodhamaggesu nirodhamaggaggahaṇassa kāraṇabhāvena pavattamānā
analyzed: tad paṭicchādana vasena anirodha maggesu nirodha magga ggahaṇassa kāraṇa bhāvena pavattamānā

original: Atthānatthanti hitāhitaṃ. Sammohavinodaniyaṃ pana “atthattha”nti vuttaṃ, tattha attho

original: eva atthatthoti atthassa aviparītatādassanatthaṃ dutiyena atthasaddena visesanaṃ.

original: Atthatthanti vā āmeḍitavacanaṃ sabbesaṃ atthānaṃ pākaṭakaraṇabhāvappakāsanatthaṃ,

original: Paṭividdhassa puna avekkhanā paccavekkhaṇā. Ducintitacintitādilakkhaṇassa bālassa

analyzed: bhāvaḥ bālyam sampajānāti iti samam pakārehi jānāti balava mohaḥ pamohaḥ samantataḥ mohanam

original: sammoho. Duggatigāmikammassa visesapaccayattā avindiyaṃ. Vindatīti labhati. Anavajjadhammānaṃ
analyzed: sammohaḥ duggati gāmi kammassa visesa paccaya ttā avindiyam vindati iti labhati anavajja dhammānam

original: vijjā viya visesapaccayo na hotīti vindiyaṃ na vindati. Ayaṃ avijjāya vemattatāti
analyzed: vijjā viya visesa paccayaḥ na hoti iti na vindati ayam avijjāya vematta tā ti

original: ayaṃ “dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādinā kiccajātilakkhaṇehi vutto avijjāya aviseso. Vijjātiādīnaṃ
analyzed: ayam dukkhe aññāṇa nti ādinā kicca jāti lakkhaṇehi vuttaḥ avijjāya avisesaḥ vijjā āti ādīnam

original: vuttanayānasārena attho veditabbo.
analyzed: vutta nayāna sārena atthaḥ veditabbo

original: Pāsāṇasakkharavālikāvirahitā bhūmi saṇhāti “saṇhaṭṭhenā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pāsāṇa sakkhara vālikā virahitā bhūmi saṇhā ti saṇha aṭṭhena ati vuttam

original: Tattakameva kālanti pañcakappasatāni. Vibhūtaṃ samattikkantaṃ rūpasaññāsaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: tattakam eva pañca kappa satāni vibhūtam samattikkantam rūpa saññā saṅkhātam

original: rūpaṃ etāyāti vibhūtarūpaṃ, samāpattinti padattho. Na hi kāci arūpasamāpatti rūpasaññāsahagatā
analyzed: rūpam vibhūta rūpam samāpatti nti padatthaḥ na hi kāci arūpa samāpatti rūpa saññā sahagatā

original: pavattīti. Nirodhasamāpattiyaṃ vattabbameva natthi, tattha nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā
analyzed: pavatti iti nirodha samāpattiyam vattabbam eva natthi tattha nevasaññānāsaññāyatana samāpattiyam

original: visuṃ gahitattā vuttaṃ “sesāruppasamāpattiyo”ti.
analyzed: visum gahita ttā vuttam sesa āruppa samāpattiyāḥ ti

original: Damathaṃ anupagacchanto duṭṭhasso khaluṅkasso. Uttaridamathāyāti ariyamaggadamathāya.
analyzed: damatham an upagacchantaḥ duṭṭhassa khaluṅkassa uttari damathāya ati ariya magga damathāya

original: Itaroti dukkhāpaṭipado khippābhiñño, sukhāpaṭipado ca khippābhiñño. Ubhayatobhāgehīti rūpakāyanāmakāyabhāgehi. Ubhayatoti vikkhambhanasamucchedavimuttivasena.
analyzed: itaro ti dukkha apaṭipado khippa abhiñño sukha apaṭipado ca khippa abhiñño ubhayatas bhāgehi iti rūpa kāya nāma kāya bhāgehi ubhayatas ti vikkhambhana samuccheda vimutti vasena

original: Anekopīti sabhāvena anekopi. Ekasaddābhidheyyatāyāti sāmaññasaddābhidheyyatāya.
analyzed: anekaḥ upi iti sabhāvena anekaḥ upi eka sadda abhidheyya tāya ati sāmañña sadda abhidheyya tāya

original: Adhiṭṭhānahāravibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

analyzed: parikkhāra hāra vibhaṅga vaṇṇanā

analyzed: hinoti iti padassa attham dassentaḥ kāraṇa bhāvam gacchati iti āha aneka attha ttā dhātūnam eti iti āgacchati uppajjati iti atthaḥ

original: Avijjāyapi hetubhāveti ettha avijjā anantarāya avijjāya anantarasamanantarūpanissayanatthivigatāsevanapaccayehi,

original: Nibbattiattho phalattho phalasaṅkhāto attho.
analyzed: nibbatti atthaḥ phala atthaḥ phala saṅkhātaḥ atthaḥ

analyzed: paramparāya ca nibbattanato

analyzed: parikkhāra hāra vibhaṅga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 16. Samāropanahāravibhaṅgavaṇṇanā
analyzed: samāropana hāra vibhaṅga vaṇṇanā

analyzed: suttena gahitā iti sutte vutte padaṭṭhāna ggahaṇam adhiṭṭhāna visaya dassana attham

original: Vanuteti yācati, patthetīti attho. Pañca kāmaguṇā kāmataṇhāya kāraṇaṃ hoti ārammaṇapaccayatāya.

analyzed: vedanā vasena ati padena attanā uppādita dukkha vasena vedanā pariññāya ati vedanūpika viññāṇa ṭṭhiti pariññāya

original: Niccābhinivesapaṭipakkhato aniccānupassanāyāti adhippāyo. Niccasaññānimittassāti
analyzed: nicca abhinivesa paṭipakkhataḥ anicca anupassanāya ati adhippāyaḥ nicca saññā nimittassa ati

analyzed: nicca saññā hetukassa saññā pariññāya ati saññūpika viññāṇa ṭṭhiti pariññāya paṭhama magga vajjhattā

analyzed: samāropana hāra vibhaṅga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Niṭṭhitā ca hāravibhaṅgavaṇṇanā.

original: 1. Desanāhārasampātavaṇṇanā
analyzed: desanā āhāra sampāta vaṇṇanā

original: suviracitajambunadābharaṇasadisī ca pāḷi. Tattha katanānāvaṇṇapupphūpahārasadisī,

original: vividharaṃsijālāsamujjalabaddhanānāratanāvalisadisī ca hāravibhaṅgadesanāti dasseti.
analyzed: vividha raṃsi jālā samujjala baddha nānā ratana āvali sadisī ca hāra vibhaṅga desanā ati dasseti

original: Pacchimena tassa paṇītamahārahe jaṭāhi saddhiṃ dukkaratarataṃ dīpeti. Yāyaṃ gāthā vuttāti yojanā.

analyzed: yasmā ayam hāra vibhaṅga vāraḥ yathā vuttena kāraṇena tasmā sā hāra vibhaṅga vārassa

analyzed: tam gātham yathā vuttena iva kāraṇena tasmai soḷasape āha ati

original: āha. Yojanānayadassananti yojanāya nayadassanaṃ.
analyzed: āha yojana anaya dassanam ti yojanāya naya dassanam

original: Tenāti “taṃ maccuno pada”nti vacanena. Sabbaṃ vipallāsanti dvādasavidhampi vipallāsaṃ.
analyzed: tena ati tam maccuno vacanena sabbam vipallāsanti dvādasavidham pi vipallāsam

original: Sāmaññassa…pe… voharīyati yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ sāmaññaṃ, so viseso. Atthato pana saññādayo
analyzed: yattha patiṭṭhitam sāmaññam so visesaḥ atthato pana saññā ādayo

original: eva rūpādivisayaṃ viparītākārena gaṇhante vipallāsoti dassento “saññāvipallāso”tiādimāha.
analyzed: eva rūpa ādi visayam viparīta ākārena gaṇhante vipallāso ti dassento saññā vipallāsaḥ tiādim āha

original: Indajālādivasena maṇiādiākārena upaṭṭhahante upādānakkhandhapañcake ahaṃmamādikāraṇatāya

analyzed: nirutti nayena attā iti vuccamāno taṃ buddhi vohāra ppavatti nimitta tāya atta bhāvo sukha ādīnam

original: vatthutāya “attabhāvavatthū”ti pavuccatīti āha “tehī”tiādi. Tesanti upādānakkhandhānaṃ.
analyzed: vatthu tāya atta bhāva vatthū ti pavuccati iti āha tehi itiādi tesanti upādānakkhandhānam

original: Vipallāsānaṃ pavattiākāro “asubhe subha”ntiādi. Visayo kāyavedanācittadhammā. Avijjā
analyzed: vipallāsānam pavatti ākāraḥ asubhe visayaḥ kāya vedanā citta dhammāḥ avijjā

original: ca…pe… eva sammohapubbakattā sabbavipallāsānaṃ. Ca-saddo subhasukhasaññānanti etthāpi ānetvā yojetabbo.
analyzed: cape eva sammoha pubbaka ttā sabba vipallāsānam ca saddaḥ subha sukha saññānam ti ettha api ānetvā yojetabbaḥ

original: Tatthāyaṃ yojanā – “avijjā ca subhasukhasaññānaṃ paccayo eva, na taṇhā eva, avijjā
analyzed: tattha ayam yojanā avijjā ca subha sukha saññānam paccayaḥ eva na taṇhā eva avijjā

original: subhasukhasaññānañca paccayo, na niccaattasaññānaṃ evā”ti. Evaṃ santepi purimānaṃ
analyzed: subha sukha saññānam ca paccayaḥ na nicca atta saññānam eva ati evam sante pi purimānam

original: dvinnaṃ viparītasaññānaṃ taṇhā, pacchimānaṃ avijjā visesapaccayoti dassento āha “tathāpī”tiādi.
analyzed: dvinnam viparīta saññānam taṇhā pacchimānam avijjā visesa paccayo ti dassentaḥ āha tathā api itiādi

original: Avijjāsīsena cettha diṭṭhiyā gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tenāha “diṭṭhinivutaṃ citta”nti,
analyzed: avijjā sīsena ca ittha diṭṭhiyāḥ gahaṇam veditabbam tena āha diṭṭhi nivutam cittam ti

original: “yo diṭṭhivipallāso”ti ca ādi, yathā ca avijjāsīsena diṭṭhiyā gahaṇaṃ, evaṃ diṭṭhisīsena
analyzed: yaḥ diṭṭhi vipallāsaḥ ti ca ādi yathā ca avijjā sīsena diṭṭhiyāḥ gahaṇam evam diṭṭhi sīsena

original: aññamaññaanuppaveso niggamo”ti ayaṃ duvidho attho. Piṭakānaṃ atthakathanaṃ peṭakaṃ,
analyzed: aññamañña anuppavesaḥ niggamaḥ ti ayam duvidhaḥ atthaḥ piṭakānam attha kathanam peṭakam

original: so eva upadesoti peṭakopadeso, upadesabhūtā pariyattisaṃvaṇṇanāti attho.
analyzed: saḥ eva upadeso ti peṭaka upadesaḥ upadesa bhūtā pariyatti saṃvaṇṇanā ti attho

original: Ādito paṭṭhāyāti nayānaṃ aññamaññaanuppavesaniggamamattameva avibhāvetvā nayavicārassa paṭhamāvayavato pabhuti vibhāvanā dīpanā pakāsanā.
analyzed: āditas paṭṭhāya ati nayānam aññamañña anuppavesa niggama mattam eva a vibhāvetvā naya vicārassa paṭhama avayavataḥ pabhuti vibhāvanā dīpanā pakāsanā

original: Dosadiṭṭhīti appassādatādidosagāhikadiṭṭhī, dosadassinoti attho. Te hi asamūhatānusayā,
analyzed: dosa diṭṭhī iti appassāda tā ādi dosa gāhika diṭṭhī dosa dassino ti attho te hi a samūha tā anusayā

original: kāmesu ca ādīnavadassino. Idañhi nesaṃ aṅgadvayaṃ attakilamathānuyogassa kāraṇaṃ
analyzed: kāmesu ca ādīnava dassinaḥ idam hi na isam aṅga dvayam atta kilamatha anuyogassa kāraṇam

original: attho, so madhubindugiddhassa madhulittasatthadhārāvalehanasadiso appassādo bahudukkho

original: kāmehi payojanaṃ na vijjati. Anajjhositāti anabhibhūtā viharanti. Tena vuccati sukhā

original: paṭipadāti tena mandakilesabhāvena tesaṃ puggalānaṃ akicchena sijjhamānā vipassanā

original: ime taṇhādiṭṭhicaritabhāvena dvidhā vuttā aparimāṇappabhedā sabbepi paṭipajjantā sattā.

original: Sukhena paṭinissajjantīti kilese akicchena pajahanti. “Imā catasso paṭipadā”tiādi

original: visayabhūtesu niddhāretvā kathetabbā.
analyzed: visaya bhūtesu niddhāretvā kathetabbā

original: Idañca pamāṇaṃ cattāro āhārāti imesaṃ vipallāsānaṃ pavattiyā pamāṇaṃ, yadidaṃ cattāro

analyzed: cattāro vipallāse vibhajanti yāvat eva cattāro vipallāsāḥ appahīnā tāvat eva cattāri

analyzed: upādānāni paribrūhanti iti evam sabbattha yathāraham vattabbam tena āha evam imāni

original: sabbāni dasa padānī”ti. “Yojetabbānī”ti ca vacanaseso.
analyzed: sabbāni dasa padāni iti yojetabbāni iti ca vacana sesaḥ

original: “Abhijjhāya ganthatī”ti iminā abhijjhāyanameva ganthananti dasseti. Esa nayo sesesupi. Papañcentoti diṭṭhābhinivesaṃ vitthārento.
analyzed: abhijjhāya ganthati iti iminā abhijjhāyanam eva ganthananti dasseti esa nayo sesesu pi papañcento ti diṭṭha abhinivesam vitthārento

original: Vippaṭisāruppattihetubhāvo kilesānaṃ āsavananti āha “āsavantī”ti. Kiṃ vippaṭisārāti
analyzed: vippaṭisāru patti hetu bhāvaḥ kilesānam āsavananti āha āsavanti iti kim

original: tena kilesānaṃ vītikkamavatthuṃ vadati. Yasmā appahīnānusayasseva vippaṭisārā, na

original: itarassa, tasmā “ye vippaṭisārā, te anusayā”ti vuttaṃ. Padadvayenapi phalūpacārena kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.

original: Paṭhamena padenāti yathāvuttesu dasasu suttapadesu paṭhamena padena. Paṭhamāya disāyāti tadatthasaṅkhātāya sīhavikkīḷitassa saṃkilesapakkhe paṭhamāya disāya.

original: Itīti evaṃ, vuttanayenāti attho. Kusalākusalānanti yathāvuttaanavajjasāvajjadhammānaṃ.
analyzed: iti iti evam vutta nayena ati attho kusala akusalānam ti yathā vutta anavajja sāvajja dhammānam

original: Pakkhapaṭipakkhavasenāti vodānapakkhatappaṭipakkhavasena. Yojanāti paṭhamadisādibhāvena
analyzed: pakkha paṭipakkha vasena āti vodāna pakkha tappaṭipakkha vasena yojanā ati paṭhama disa ādi bhāvena

original: yutte katvā manasānupekkhanā. “Manasā volokayate”ti hi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: yutte katvā manasā anupekkhanā manasā volokayatā iti hi vuttam

original: Tassāti disālokanassa. Sotāpattiphalādīnaṃ pariyosānatā indriyavasena veditabbā.
analyzed: tassa iti disā ālokanassa sotāpatti phala ādīnam pariyosāna tā indriya vasena veditabbā

analyzed: pariyosāna tā tattha sotāpatti phale saddhi indriyam pāripūrim gacchati sotāpannaḥ hi

analyzed: saddhāya paripūri kārī sakadāgāmi phale vīriya indriyam pāripūrim gacchati sakadāgāmī

original: Anāgāmī samādhismiṃ paripūrikārī. Aggaphale arahatte satindriyañca paññindriyañca
analyzed: anāgāmī samādhismiṃ paripūrikārī agga phale arahatte sati indriyañca paññindriyañca

original: pāripūriṃ gacchati. Arahā hi sativepullappatto, paññāvepullappatto cāti.

original: Apare panāhu – saddhābalena subhasaññāya pahānaṃ. Saddahanto hi paṭikkūlamanasikāre

original: yonisomanasikāramanuyuñjati. Samādhibalena niccasaññāya pahānaṃ. Samāhito hi saṅkhārānaṃ

analyzed: udaya bbayam pariggaṇhantaḥ anicca saññam paṭilabhati paññā balena atta saññāya pahānam

original: Paññavā hi saṅkhārānaṃ avasavattitaṃ sallakkhento attasuññataṃ paṭivijjhati. Sati
analyzed: paññavā hi saṅkhārānam avasavatti tam sallakkhentaḥ atta suñña tam paṭivijjhati sati

original: pana sabbatthāpi icchitabbā. Tenāha “satiṃ ca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti.

original: Evaṃ catuvipallāsappahāyīnaṃ catunnaṃ indriyānaṃ pāripūriṭṭhānaṃ cattāri sāmaññaphalāni

original: “Lobho akusalamūla”ntiādi lobhādīnaṃ hetuphalabhāvena sampayuttatāya dassanaṃ.
analyzed: lobho akusala mūlam tiādi lobha ādīnam hetu phala bhāvena sampayutta tāya dassanam

analyzed: tattha manāpikena ati yebhuyya vasena vuttam amanāpikena api hi ārammaṇena vipariyesa vasena

original: sahajātāpi labbhanti, asahajātāpi. “Uppādo”ti etena uppajjamānasaṅkhāraggahaṇanti

analyzed: siyā na hi uppādaḥ uppajjati rāga ja pariḷāha hetuka tā ca tesam rāgassa taṇhā sabhāva ttā

original: Taṇhā hi dukkhassa samudayo, yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhanti. Tathā
analyzed: taṇhā hi dukkhassa samudayaḥ yam kiñci samudaya dhammam sabbam tam dukkhanti tathā

original: ca vuttaṃ “taṇhāsahajātavedanāya pana lobho sahajātādipaccayehi ca paccayo”ti. Evaṃ
analyzed: ca vuttam taṇhā sahajāta vedanāya pana lobho sahajāta ādi paccayehi ca paccayaḥ ti evam

original: iṭṭhārammaṇe uppannalobhasahagatasukhavedanāya udayo idha “uppādo saṅkhatalakkhaṇa”nti

analyzed: vuttaḥ tassā vipariṇāmaḥ vipariṇāma dukkha tā ti vipariṇāma avatthā ca udaya avattham

original: vinā na hotīti sā taṃ nissāya uppajjantī viya vuttā “uppādaṃ…pe… dukkhatā”ti.

original: Doso akusalamūlantiādīsupi vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso –
analyzed: dosaḥ akusala mūlam ti ādīsu pi vutta naya anusārena atthaḥ veditabbaḥ ayam pana viseso

original: ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ nāma jarā, taṃ nissāya domanassassa uppajjanato vuttaṃ “ṭhitassa…pe…
analyzed: ṭhitassa aññathattam nāma jarā tam nissāya domanassassa uppajjanataḥ vuttam ṭhitassa pe

original: dukkhadukkhatā”ti. Dosajapariḷāhahetukatā jarāya dosabahulassa puggalassa nacirena jīraṇato veditabbā.
analyzed: dukkha dukkha tā ati dosa ja pariḷāha hetuka tā jarāya dosa bahulassa puggalassa nacirena jīraṇataḥ veditabbā

original: Vayoti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodho. Aniccatāvasena ca saṅkhatadhammānaṃ saṅkhāradukkhatāti
analyzed: vayaḥ ti saṅkhārānam nirodhaḥ anicca tā vasena ca saṅkhata dhammānam saṅkhāra dukkha tā ti

original: vuttaṃ “vaya…pe… saṅkhāradukkhatā”ti. Tenāha bhagavā “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti.
analyzed: vuttam vayape saṅkhāra dukkha tā ti tena āha bhagavā yat aniccam tam dukkhanti

original: Mohajapariḷāhahetukatā vayalakkhaṇassa yebhuyyena sammohanimittattā, maraṇassa avijjāpaccayattā
analyzed: moha ja pariḷāha hetuka tā vaya lakkhaṇassa yebhuyyena sammoha nimitta ttā maraṇassa avijjā paccaya ttā

original: ca saṃsārappavattiyā veditabbā.
analyzed: ca saṃsāra ppavattiyā veditabbā

original: Alobhādīnaṃ paññādipāripūrihetukatā yathārahaṃ upanissayakoṭisahajātakoṭiyā ca paccayabhāvena

original: veditabbā. Sabbe hi kusalā dhammā sabbesaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ paccayavisesā
analyzed: veditabbā sabbe hi kusalāḥ dhammā sabbesam kusalānam dhammānam yathāsambhavam paccaya visesā

original: honti evāti. Abyāpādavitakkasannissayo upavicāro abyāpādūpavicāro. Avihiṃsūpacārepi eseva nayo.

original: Ayaṃ tipukkhalo nāma dutiyo nayo saddhiṃ disālokananayena niddiṭṭhoti vacanaseso.
analyzed: ayam tipukkhalaḥ nāma dutiyaḥ nayo saddhim disālokana nayena niddiṭṭhaḥ ti vacana seso

original: “Ime cattāro”tiādi puggalādhiṭṭhāneneva nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmidassanatthaṃ
analyzed: ime cattāro tiādi puggala adhiṭṭhānena iva nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmi dassana ttham

analyzed: āraddham ime yathā vutta paṭipadā catukkassa vasena catubbidhāḥ visesena ati diṭṭhi taṇhā sannissaya tā visesena

original: Diṭṭhicarito hi tikkhapañño, mandapañño ca sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya ca dandhābhiññāya
analyzed: diṭṭhi caritaḥ hi tikkha paññaḥ manda pañño ca sukhāya paṭipadāya khippa abhiññāya ca dandha abhiññāya

original: ca niyyātīti dvidhā vuttoti. Tathā taṇhācarito dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya
analyzed: ca niyyāti iti dvidhā vuttaḥ ti tathā taṇhā ācarito dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippa abhiññāya

original: ca dandhābhiññāya ca niyyātīti dvidhā vuttoti dassito cāyamattho. Tenāha “dve honti
analyzed: ca dandha abhiññāya ca niyyāti iti dvidhā vuttaḥ ti dassitaḥ ca ayam attho tena āha dve honti

original: diṭṭhicarito ca taṇhācarito cā”ti.
analyzed: diṭṭhi carito ca taṇhā carito ca ati

original: Cattāro hutvāti sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmidassane cattāro hutvā ṭhitā, catuppaṭipadāvasena
analyzed: cattāraḥ hutvā iti sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmi dassane cattāraḥ hutvā ṭhitā catur paṭipadā vasena

original: cattāro katvā vuttāti attho. Tayo hontīti tipukkhalassa nayassa bhūmidassane ugghaṭitaññuādivasena
analyzed: cattāro katvā vuttā ati attho tayaḥ honti iti tipukkhalassa nayassa bhūmi dassane ugghaṭita ññu ādi vasena

original: tayo bhavanti. Tayo hutvāti tathā tayo hutvā ṭhitā tayo katvā kathitā. Dve hontīti
analyzed: tayaḥ bhavanti tayaḥ hutvā ati tathā tayaḥ hutvā ṭhitā tayaḥ katvā kathitā dve honti iti

original: idāni nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmidassane dve bhavanti. Ajjhosānanti diṭṭhiajjhosānaṃ.
analyzed: idāni nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmi dassane dve bhavanti ajjhosānam ti diṭṭhi ajjhosānam

original: Abhinivesoti taṇhābhiniveso. Ahaṃkāroti ahaṃmāno “aha”nti vā karaṇaṃ ahaṃkāro. Diṭṭhimānamaññanānaṃ
analyzed: abhiniveso ti taṇhā abhinivesaḥ ahaṃkāro ti ahaṃmānaḥ ahanti vā karaṇam ahaṃkāraḥ diṭṭhi māna maññanānam

original: vasena “ahamasmī”ti samanupassanā mamaṃkāro, mamāyanaṃ taṇhāggāho.

original: 113. Attano anavajjasukhāvahaṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjanto paramatthato attakāmo nāmāti āha “attano sukhakāmo”ti. Sukhānubandhañhi sukhaṃ kāmento sukhameva kāmetīti ca sukhakāmoti.

original: “Uddha”ntiādi kāladesānaṃ anavasesapariyādānanti āha “uddhanti anāgataṃ, upari cā”tiādi. Gamanenāti cutūpapātagamanena.

analyzed: saṃkilesabhāgiya ādike lokiya ādike ca yathā rahanti yaḥ yaḥ saṃsagga vasena yojanam arahati

original: so so dhammo. Sambhavāvirodheneva hi yojanā. Na hi “lokiyaṃ nibbedhabhāgiya”ntiādinā yojanā sambhavati.
analyzed: so so dhammo sambhava avirodhena iva hi yojanā na hi lokiyam yojanā sambhavati

original: Tīsu piṭakesu labbhamānassāti tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhe tepiṭake buddhavacane upalabbhamānassa
analyzed: tīsu piṭakesu labbhamānassa ati tissaḥ saṅgītiyaḥ āruḷhe tepiṭake buddha vacane upalabbhamānassa

original: vijjamānassa, etena na kevalaṃ saṅgaho eva yathāvuttabhedānaṃ paṭṭhānabhāgānaṃ niddhāraṇāya
analyzed: vijjamānassa etena na kevalam saṅgahaḥ eva yathā vutta bhedānam paṭṭhāna bhāgānam niddhāraṇāya

original: kāraṇaṃ, atha kho pāḷiyaṃ dassanañcāti vibhāveti. Tenāha “yaṃ dissati tāsu tāsu bhūmīsū”ti.
analyzed: kāraṇam atha kho pāḷiyam dassanam ca ati vibhāveti tena āha yam dissati tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu iti

original: “Teneva hī”tiādinā yathāvuttassa atthassa pāṭhānugamaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: tena iva hi iti ādinā yathā vuttassa atthassa pāṭha anugamam dasseti

original: Sāsanapaṭṭhānavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sāsana paṭṭhāna vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Nigamanakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: nigamana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Saddhammāvataraṭṭhāneti desantarato āgantvā saddhammassa avataraṇokāsabhūte saddhammassavanadhāraṇaparicayaparipucchāmanasikārabahulānaṃ
analyzed: saddhamma avatara ṭṭhāne iti desa antarataḥ āgantvā saddhammassa avataraṇa ukāsa bhūte saddhamma ssavana dhāraṇa paricaya paripucchā manasikāra bahulānam

original: nivāsaṭṭhānataṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ, attano vā santāne pariyattisaddhammassa anuppavesanaṭṭhānatāya
analyzed: nivāsa ṭṭhāna tam sandhāya itam vuttam attanaḥ vā santāne pariyatti sat dhammassa an uppavesana ṭṭhāna tāya

original: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
analyzed: evam vuttam sesam su viññeyyam eva ati

original: Nettiaṭṭhakathāya līnatthavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: netti aṭṭhakathāya līnatthavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Nettippakaraṇa-ṭīkā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: niṭṭhitā
